Alt Tag Errors.selector: html > body > table > tbody > tr:nth-child(3) > td:nth-child(3) > span > p > img
Alt Tag Errors.message: Img element missing an alt attribute. Use the alt attribute to specify a short text alternative.

HTML Attribute Errors.selector: html > body > table > tbody > tr:nth-child(3) > td:nth-child(1) > form > input:nth-child(3)
HTML Attribute Errors.message: This text input element does not have a name available to an accessibility API. Valid names are: label element, title attribute.

Form Errors.selector: html > body > table > tbody > tr:nth-child(3) > td:nth-child(1) > form > input:nth-child(3)
Form Errors.message: This form field should be labelled in some way. Use the label element (either with a "for" attribute or wrapped around the form field), or "title", "aria-label" or "aria-labelledby" attributes as appropriate.

Alt Tag Errors.message: Img element is the only content of the link, but is missing alt text. The alt text should describe the purpose of the link.
